ca.ualberta.cs.views

Class MainScreenActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cs.views.MainScreenActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<AuthorModel>

    public class MainScreenActivity
extends Activity
implements Observer<AuthorModel>
    This class is the view for the first screen that the user sees. It is an observer to the authorModel It has an instance of the AuthorController From this class, many other screens can be reached.
    Author:
    Dayna, Brendan
